Text: Seven shadows cast, seven fates foretold. Yet at the end of the broken path lies death, and death alone.
They who dwell aloft have spoken. Let their words echo in your empty soul. Ruination is come!
I call out to the skies and tremble as the brilliance of a thousand bolts blinds mine enemies and tears their flesh asunder.
Open your eyes to the darkness, and drown in its loveless embrace. The gods will not be watching.
To live by the sword is to die by the sword. There is time enough for regret in the flames of hell.
Even the strongest of shields cannot defend the weakest of wills. A moment's hesitation beckons a lifetime of pain!
Misfortune hangs heavy on a head once held high. Such is poor cover for when the heavens fall.
Honed is the blade that severs the villain's head. Endless is the path that leads him from hell.
Hark! The screams of ruin rise above the storm's discord. Shudder not in her endless cold.
You will need to withstand far more than this if you are to stand against the likes of her!
I have been called the god of thunder. You will now know why! Upon my holy blade the very world lies in balance.
And now the scales will tip!
That was merely the beginning, Warrior of Light! Merely the beginning!
Death awaits defiance!
Watch this!
You show promise. But promise won't save you from what comes next!
Let this be your final testament!
I rarely miss.
“逃がすものかッ！”
I see you!
Tell me... What is your darkest fear?
The path ends here, but for that arcane circle. Do you believe it some sort of gate?
The ruins of the monastery lie ahead, but do not think the path will be easy.
Harpies? My sisters would not allow this... Unless...
Impressive. Perhaps you are deserving of your accolades. But do you have an answer for this...this Mist? Or is it aether?
Only the name of these ruins lives on with my people. We have no knowledge of their past, nor do we wish it. Trespass into the monastery is avoided except when necessary.
Ahead! I see someone... No... Something.
The last time I was here, the only thing holding watch over these stones was a deafening silence. Could it be that guardian rose from its slumber upon sensing your master's auracite?
When the Empire marched upon Rabanastre, many who lived in the desert fled east to the sanctuary of the jungle. Some who were not turned away by my sisters are said to have taken refuge here.
There! Another...Lucavi? It appears to be a knight, but how─
She was a knight most noble, and her sacrifice will not be forgotten. My sisters will want to know much of her tale, I believe.
Something here feels different than the monastery above... Otherworldly...
Can you not feel it? An evil lurks here...one far beyond our ken.
Once, when I was very young, I heard the elders speak of a dark city where the horrors that haunt our nightmares dwell. The Necrohol, they called it─the Necrohol of Mullonde.
This...guardian─he is not like the first two. We must tread with care, lest our journey meet a premature end.
The Mist I sensed before─the aether─its flow is much stronger now. It is almost as if the guardians we defeated were somehow preventing its escape...
If I must forsake myself to keep mine oath, then so be it!
Not since Tenzen have I...I...
You brought this upon yourself!
Beg not for mercy!
How it burns!
You've nowhere to run!
Impudent mortals!
Tremble before true power!
None can match my might!
More! I must have more! O aramitama!
Grant me the strength to smite mine enemies!
Bah! Stubborn fools! This is far from over!
Divided we shall triumph!
Flesh of my flesh, show them their folly!
No, I will not lose! I cannot!
RISE WE, THE LAND, THE LAND!
FALL YOU, CRUSH YOU, OUR DUTY!
SWALLOW YOU, CONSUME YOU, OUR DUTY!
THE LAND, THE LAND, THE LAND...
RISE AGAIN, THE LAND, THE LAND!
ENDURE YOU, DEFY YOU, HOW DARE!
THE LAND, THE LAND, THE LAND...
Alright, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, it's time to put your new power to use.
You'll get the hang of it in no time. We'll warp circles around Garuda!
Get ready, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! We warp in to strike together!
Yeah, that's what I call teamwork! Keep it up!
No good─we gotta strike at the same time. Follow my lead!
Something big's comin'! Quick, get clear!
Running's too slow! Warp to the pillar!
Son of a─! Hang on, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>!
I'll take it from here!
Heh, I even amaze myself sometimes.
Defeat Garuda
Now!
Of all the places...
Hold your ground until the Warrior of Light arrives
Defeat Zenos yae Galvus
Still you choose to struggle against the inevitable...
Let's put an end to this here and now!
Behold─a taste of my true power!
Look upon Ame-no-Habakiri and know the depths of your folly!
Do you truly believe that possible? Then let us test the limits of this Garlean vessel.
Soon I shall give the lie to man's indomitable spirit.
Fight and struggle if that is your wont, but you will not escape your fate.
So, there are still those willing to stand against the crown prince. Interesting...
Our fate is not for you to decide!
<If(PlayerParameter(4))>She<Else/>He</If> comes, does <If(PlayerParameter(4))>she<Else/>he</If>? Then I need not waste my time on you.
A formidable foe... But we have come too far to fail now.
Grrr... Ngh... What is this sorcery!?
Enough! You will learn your place.
Impossible... How is it you have grown so powerful in the gift!?
You are strong, Bringer of Light, but Her blessing will avail you not.
To redress the balance─to ensure the salvation of this star─you must fall!
No matter... You may have bested Lahabrea, but I will not be cast aside so easily!
We will suffer your interference no longer.
You think you know of the dark, but I will show you the true nature of our power!
The potential of this vessel is transcendent─without limit!
Lyse, no... What have you done!?
I cannot fail... Not again...
ユウギリよ、リセを助けるぞ！

いや、よくやったユウギリよ！
残るは、わしが叩き斬ってくれようぞ！
No! I can still fight, I can still...still...
クッ……ひとつ仕損じたか……！
If he would bring all to bear then so must we!
Oh no you don't!
No... Not like this...
し、しまった……！？
Well done dispelling his phantoms. Now hurry, we must protect Lyse!
If we can at least hold out until <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)> arrives, I'm sure we can turn this around.
Warrior of Light's Timely Arrival
Strength, my friends! It would not do to have <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)> arrive to find us battered and broken!
We may be on the back foot, but it's not over yet!
Arrive at Teag Gye
Clear Teag Gye
Arrive in the Atelier
Clear the Atelier
Arrive in the throne room
Water is love, water is life! Drink up, ye parched souls!
There'll be no wilted flowers on my watch!
Onward, my friends! Onward to your prize!
Oh dear, I seem to have dropped a wasp nest! How very clumsy of me!
My apologies, but accidents do happen!
Come and play in my beautiful garden!
Awww, it's a fake! You'll just have to keep going!
Welcome! Welcome to our humble palace!
Bravo, bravo! Very impressive!
Do keep up that fine form the rest of the way!
Ah, our guests have arrived!
It's the Fuath way to give guests a smashing welcome!
Oh yes, we'll smash you! To bits and pieces!
Time for a musical interlude!
O sweet melody, take phantasmic form!
You mastered the melody! Bravo!
For you, I will play a song...of terror!
Give me a crescendo! Give me a fortissimo!
Nooo! M-My performance!
Bear witness to the first doom
Endure the first doom
Bear witness to the second doom
Endure the second doom
Bear witness to the third doom
Welcome to the final days of Amaurot...
The fabric of our star began to fray...
...and the unchecked energies of creation begat malformed beasts.
Just as prayer gives rise to primals, our dread made manifest our deepest fears.
The land buckled; the cities burned; the waters ran red with blood...
Yet this was far from the worst of it. Come, and I will show you...
Just a little further...
...and you will see the end of a world.
The star was fading. We saw we had to weave its laws anew...
But between us and our goal loomed a final misbegotten fiend...

The beast bellows, and gives birth to terror.
A terror which, in turn, gives birth to new beasts...
Its gaze turns skyward, and fiery rain falls from the heavens...
Once the fear has taken root, it cannot be expunged...
As if feeding upon the horror, the beast bloats...then shivers...then ruptures...
Defeat <sheet(BNpcName,8210,0)>
The first beast was striking in its unsightliness...
As if to scour away all life, it called down a cataclysmic deluge.
Yet even its defeat did not halt the march of oblivion...
From the depths of despair, the last harbinger arose...
Its voice was fulgent destruction, and none could stand in its path.
And as it edged inexorably closer, we knew...
Without decisive sacrifice, our star would surely perish.
Arrive at Terminus
Clear Terminus
Arrive at Malikah's Gift
Clear Malikah's Gift
Arrive at Unquestioned Acceptance
Defeat <sheet(BNpcName,8249,0)>
Arrive at Repurposing
Clear Repurposing
Arrive at Aetherial Observation
Clear Aetherial Observation
Arrive at the Cornice
Temporal stasis sequence initiated
Deactivation in 3...
Deactivation in 2...
Deactivation in 1...
Temporal stasis deactivated
Arrive in Ichthyology
Clear Ichthyology
Arrive in Phytobiology
Clear Phytobiology
Arrive in Phantomology
I offer up my life's energies in the name of noble creation! Come forth, Quetzalcoatl! Tame the frenzy which profanes these halls!
You shouldn't be in here! The beast has broken free, and released the other experiments!
Defeat <sheet(BNpcName,8273,0)>
Arrive at the Divine Threshold
Clear the Divine Threshold
Arrive in Shadowed Hollow
Clear Shadowed Hollow
Arrive at the Song of Ox'Gatorl
Open your eyes, and purge the Ravel of this taint!
Guardians of the Ravel─in the name of the emperor, I bid you awaken!
Crush...intruders... Raaaaaargh!
Defeat <sheet(BNpcName,8233,0)>
洞窟の奥から、何かが聞こえてきた……
洞窟の奥から、叫び声のようなものが聞こえてきた……
洞窟の奥から、またもや叫び声が聞こえた……！
叫び声の主は、近くにいるようだ……！
Relive Branden and Ardbert's battle against Tadric!
Come, my children! Render up your lives for your master!
For all your crimes and more, you will pay!
The direct approach isn't working...
Your feeble tricks are no match for my magicks!
He's drawing upon the aether of his thralls. Kill them!
Poor bastards. That's what you get for trusting a court mage...
Branden! Bring them all in close!
Such an incredible display of strength! The stuff of legends!
There's no escape, Tadric! Surrender!
While I still have so many lives at my disposal? I think not.

Come, children! In death shall your meaningless
lives gain glorious purpose!
I'll defend Lamitt! Branden, go to Nyelbert!
Now... Burn bright for me, and die, die, die!
How many more must die for your vanity!?
No sacrifice is too great to claim what is by rights mine!
Rise, my children! Rise and defend me!
TAAADRIIIC!!!
Branden─don't let him cast that spell! Do whatever it takes!
Hahaha! What is life but a medium for my magicks!?
How much longer can you hold the line, I wonder?
The bastard's keen to drag this out...
Everyone! Now's our chance to turn the tide!
I've still got a few arrows in my quiver!
Branden, bring them all into the center like before!
See that, Tadric!? You're next!
Time to thin the herd...starting with that dwarf perhaps?
Don't you touch her, you bastard!
Branden─we have to defend Lamitt at all costs!
Whew, thank you both!
I tire of these theatrics. Let us end this farce here and now!
This castle will be your tomb!

He's channeling a vast quantity of aether!
Whatever he's preparing, we cannot let him finish!
You heard Lamitt! We have to stop him!
Don't ask for mercy, Tadric. You won't get it!

Mwahaha! You are beaten, Branden!
Voeburt and your precious princess are mine for the taking!
We can't keep this up forever!
You are most tenacious, but everyone has their limits...

That attack's too much for any one person to take!
We have to stand together! Understood!?
Understood!
Your end is nigh!
Surely no one can harness such a massive torrent of aether...
Such obedient children, to offer up their lives in sacrifice!
Unrepentant to the last... This madness dies with you.
Come and play! For the night is bright, and you can sleep when you're dead!
Squish, squash! A crimson flower!
This may tingle a bit!
This is the rhythm of the light!
Twist and sprout!
We're sick of this cramped old castle! Let's play in the forest!
Dance like the leaves on the boughs!
This is so much fun! Let's play some more!
Wet, wet, wet!
When you play with fire...
Can you guess which one?
Grow, my lovelies! Grow!
Bigger is better!
Owww, that hurts! You play rough!
I grow weary of this waking dream. 'Tis time to sleep for good.
Where did everyone go? Why did they all leave me?
The more the merrier! Join us, my children!
Arrive at the Wound
Clear the Wound
Arrive in the Auction
Clear the Auction
Arrive in the Manor House Courtyard
Defeat <sheet(BNpcName,8301,0)>
Ah...ah...ah... Graaargh!
Grrraaarrrgh!!!

Servants of the accursed Light,
this world is not yours to claim!
By my hand, the veil between our worlds is torn open!
Gaze into the abyss and despair!

It is too late to beg forgiveness.
Your fate is sealed.
May shadow blot out the Light!
From beyond the rift, your doom draws near...
Your evil will not go unpunished!
Ravager of worlds, judgment is upon you!
Defeat Voidwalker
I shall erase you from existence─mind, body, and soul!
My blade hungers for your lifeblood, evil one!
Defeat the lesser eater!
Defeat Sophrosyne!
Relive Lamitt's battle in pursuit of ancient secrets!
Watch closely...
Wait for it... There!
...Why doesn't it fix the other one, though?
Well, makes our lives easier, I guess. Chaaarge!
Take down the weakling first!
\\<huff>
Ha! Ain't no match for us!
Now for Sophrosy─ Oh. Shite.
How does it do that so fast?
Right. Divide and conquer, then. You take Sophrosyne.
Urgh... Can I get some help, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>?
It's working! Keep at it!
Ha! Take that, you─ What!?
I'm so sorry... After everything you did for me...
How am I still not strong enough?
I'm...\\<huff>...not going to make it...
I can't keep up...
I'll keep it busy!
Ouch! Please tell me your Esuna can fix this...
Much better! And now I take my revenge...
It's a big one! To me, quickly!
Nicely done, everyone!
I don't know what's coming, but it can't be good...

Gods, it's as if my strength is being drained somehow...
I need you to heal me as much as you can!
You did it! I'm alright!
The statues─they're moving!
I'll draw their focus. Meanwhile...
Say no more! Just keep them in one place.
Tougher than I thought... But I'll get you yet!
That's all of them. Now, let's finish this!
It's going for you, Lamitt! Come here!
I need...help...
I get the feeling that you just saved my life. Again!
We're so close! Hit it with everything you've got!
We'll follow your lead, Lamitt!
If I'm not fully healed soon, I think I might...\\<pant>
Come, then! Prepare for judgment!
To me, my servants! Feast upon these villains and their foul sins!
Receive of me my blessing and rise higher!
Fine, fine! If you refuse to die...
Then you will suffer! Yes! That will be your punishment!
Suffer, suffer, suffer! Suffer and know your folly!
Damn you... Why do you not fall?
Why? WHYYY!?
Graaargh! It burns, it burns!
What...what is this?
The Light surges within me! Ahhh, such bliss!
I see now... This is the passion of my ascension...
Very well, I shall embrace this trial!
Your reckoning comes.
I shall excise the sin of your existence!
My ascension to godhood is complete!
Relive Nyelbert and Ardbert's initial adventure!
ボヴァインを倒せ
Your aid is most welcome, Nyelbert. Let us make short work of the beast, and take our leave of this place while we still can.
...Indeed.
They come! Nyelbert, we will draw our foe's attack!
It would seem we're not the only ones stuck in here, eh?
I have a bad feeling about this...
The leftmost one is mine! Cylva, you take its friend on the right!
Consider it done. Have at you, fiends!
チィッ！　もう1体いやがったか！
ラミット！　クソッ、あの岩を破壊しないとマズいぞ！
すまない……ラミット……。
命拾いしたわ、ありがとう……！
ああ、俺の仲間を助けてくれて感謝する！
Well, aren't you a big boy...
Still think you could have managed on your own, mage?
Perhaps...it would have been more of a struggle than I expected.
開けた場所に出そうです。
ここが、ボヴァインの根城か……。
That's him. He's the one who drinks of the mines' aether.
All right, let's put this oversized bull out to pasture. Cylva, Lamitt, Nyelbert...with me!
My magicks are yours...for now.
I will take the front. The battle is on!
It summons others of its ilk? We should dispatch the small fry, and quickly!
Leave it to me!
Gah, this one looks like trouble!
That should do it, Cylva!
Another earthquake? This bodes ill...
Our foe's up to something! Stand back, my friends!
To my side! I'll heal your wounds!
Damn it, here it comes again! Get back!
Take cover behind the rocks! You don't want to bear the full brunt of it!
I sense unholy power... Get behind me, friends! Quickly!
Cylva...are you all right!? Damn it, we can't keep this up much longer. Strike with all of your strength!

チィッ、はずしたか！
だが、あと少しで……！　このまま押し切るんだ！
Taynor, my friend... Forgive me...
What's this? It leads deeper within...?
We really should have asked for a map. Not that it'd have been much use after all the cave-ins...
Reach the bowels of the Great Pyramid of Ux'ner
We must hurry. Before the Eulmoran soldiers gain any ground.
Wait! Do you see those sentinels?
They are made to curse any who enter the pyramid. It is said to be seen by them is to be seen by death.
Dammit! We must deal with them quickly, before the curse can take hold.
This curse was not as potent as I dared imagine. But I suggest we avoid another confrontation. Its effects no doubt grow with every invocation.
<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>!? <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)> hold on!
Another sentinel. Its movement is somehow different from before.
They are massive... How are we to get around them?
I will draw their attention with a glamour.
It will not last long. The moment they are distracted we must run with all haste.
I... I was reckless...
Forgive me...
A teleportation device? This should end well...
Sister! They have reached the temple! I fear they are too fast for us.
<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>? Almet? ...Can anyone hear me?
We have been sent to...\\<cough> \\<cough>...separate chambers. This mist...
Poison. And it has─\\<cough>─nullified my magick.
Finally, fresh air. How fare you two? We have to keep moving.
I am here. <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>? Are you all right?
Could it be Ran'jit? If so, we have precious little time.
It's all right, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>. There's a path down here, but you have to jump.
Be careful of the traps inside. We are nearly there.
Somehow we are still in one piece...
That means little to the others if we do not hurry.
Run!!!
There! That crevice in the wall!
We have to jump!
Well, there is no going back now. I pray it is not much further.
Sister! Sister, can you hear me? Two soldiers have broken through our defenses!
Follow them! They are not to reach this temple, understood?
A pair of soldiers somehow made it past my sisters. No doubt on their way here.
All the more reason we should hurry, then.
Another door. Wonderful... I can but imagine what awaits us inside.
There you are!
Impossible!
More sentinels? Go, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>. I will draw their attention.
I fear I've reached my limit. We must go. Now!
I realize we must hurry, but we mustn't be reckless.
These markings on the floor. \\<cough> \\<cough> I think they show the way out.
What was that noise?
By the gods...!
This is no time for dithering. Come!
We will hold him here. Quickly, make for the Heart of Toupasa.
It is unheard of for anyone to outpace the Viis. What is this man who comes after you?
My lord demands retribution!
At once, sister!
Avoid the Ronkan executioners
Avoid the Ronkan executioners
Escape the chamber of poison
Reach the bowels of the Great Pyramid of Ux'ner
Flee from the boulders
Take a leap of faith
Reach the bowels of the Great Pyramid of Ux'ner
Defeat Ran'jit
Activate the Heart of Toupasa
Uimet! Cymet! You know what to do!
I fear this is going nowhere...
I have him!
Hurry! We cannot hold him for long!
Hurry! We can hold him no longer!
